announcements.details: Read the commentary on the readings for Easter Sunday.
announcements.title: Commentary: Easter Sunday

announcements.details: There will be ONE mass on Sunday, 27th April, 2025. Offertory will be led by St. Vincent De Paul and Wednesday borns. Bidding Prayers will be led by the Lectors.
announcements.title: Mass Schedule: Divine Mercy Sunday

announcements.details: On Monday, April 21st, 2025, we shall conclude our Easter celebrations with a fun-filled day by celebrating a joint picnic with Epiphany Catholic Church and Corpus Christi. More details will come soon.
announcements.title: Easter Monday Picnic

announcements.details: The 3-day deanery crusade comes off from Friday, April 25 to Sunday, April 27 here in St. Bakhita. On Friday, the crusade will start at 6pm. Come and surrender your praises and prayers with hope and you shall not be disappointed.
announcements.title: 3-Day Deanery Crusade

events.details: Date: 21st April, 2025 | Venue: Corpus Christi Catholic Church
events.title: Easter Monday Picnic

events.details: Date: 25th-27th April, 2025 | Venue: St Bakhita Catholic Church
events.title: 3-Day Deanery Crusade
